title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for:

1 point per image. Both a Latin example and a translation are required for each image. Three possible answers (minimal Latin for each image bolded):

  • Saepius ventis agitatur ingens pinus (more often the huge pine is assailed by the winds)

  • celsae graviore casu decidunt turres (lofty towers collapse with a heavier fall)

  • feriuntque summos fulgura montes (lightning bolts strike the loftiest mountains/mountain tops)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 points are earned for:

1 point per image. Both a Latin example and a translation are required for each image. Three possible answers (minimal Latin for each image bolded):

  • Saepius ventis agitatur ingens pinus (more often the huge pine is assailed by the winds)

  • celsae graviore casu decidunt turres (lofty towers collapse with a heavier fall)

  • feriuntque summos fulgura montes (lightning bolts strike the loftiest mountains/mountain tops)

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points are earned for:

1 point per image. Both a Latin example and a translation are required for each image. Three possible answers (minimal Latin for each image bolded):

  • Saepius ventis agitatur ingens pinus (more often the huge pine is assailed by the winds)

  • celsae graviore casu decidunt turres (lofty towers collapse with a heavier fall)

  • feriuntque summos fulgura montes (lightning bolts strike the loftiest mountains/mountain tops)

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point per image. Both a Latin example and a translation are required for each image. Three possible answers (minimal Latin for each image bolded):

  • Saepius ventis agitatur ingens pinus (more often the huge pine is assailed by the winds)

  • feriuntque summos fulgura montes (lightning bolts strike the loftiest mountains/mountain tops)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: The answer must address the vulnerability of extremes and show how the cited images apply.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: The answer must address the vulnerability of extremes and show how the cited images apply.
